products.title: ZX7 SPEAKER
products.description: Stream high quality sound wirelessly with minimal loss. The ZX7 bookshelf speaker uses high-end audiophile components that represents the top of the line powered speakers for home or studio use.

image.alt: Young adult listeing to music with XX99 Mark II headphones

overview.text: Located at the heart of New York City, Audiophile is the premier store for high end headphones, earphones, speakers, and audio accessories. We have a large showroom and luxury demonstration rooms available for you to browse and experience a wide range of our products. Stop by our store to meet some of the fantastic people who make Audiophile the best place to buy your portable audio equipment.
